job.title: Software Engineer Mobile
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Financial Services,Investment Banking
job.description: ltpgtOur CONFIDENTIAL growth client is hiring a Senior Mobile Engineer who has a strong aptitude for identifying opportunities to improve user experience robust experience translating design into code and a proactive desire to collaborate with fellow developers designers and product managers to build amazing apps Position is fulltime and reports to the Manager of Mobile EngineeringltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtCollaborate with product managers designers and backend engineers to design and deliver highquality products on iOS and AndroidltligtltligtBuild efficient and reusable UI components and architect reliable performant and maintainable solutionsltligtltligtWork alongside a team of talented engineers to continuously build ship learn and iterate on our productsltligtltligtMentor and help develop a highperforming team of engineersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtYou have at least 2 years of experience building mobile applicationsltligtltligtYou have used React Native to build crossplatform mobile applicationsltligtltligtYou are comfortable working with JavaScriptTypescript but also not afraid to jump into Swift or Kotlin as neededltligtltligtYou have knowledge of mobile best practices and stay informed about innovations in the mobile industryltligtltligtYou have a strong understanding of UXUI concepts and a demonstrated record of design sensibilityltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPreferred QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtExperience working with Bitcoin Ethereum andor blockchain technology a huge plusltligtltligtExperience working with Fastlane andor build automation toolingltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtOnce you apply well send you all company information and a highlight of their leadership teamltpgt
